comments.comment: Hema sri lankan kenektama suba dawasak wewa. Man kisi jaathibedayak balana kenek nemai,  eth deyak hemotama kiyannam. Islam agama pilipadinna hemoma quraanaya hari vidihata igana ganna ona.ekai muslim hemotama quraan igana ganneka awasha wenne. Quraan thula tiyane gehunu tamange heda lassana anith ayata pennannetuwa tamanwath araksha karagena, tamange suwami purhaya, thatha, sahodara aya nethuwa anith priminta tamange hedaruwa, lassana pennannethuwa  tamange arakshawata adinawa wagema, wenath piriminwath aaraksha karagannama ona kiyana 1 terumen tamai muslim kaanthawan burqa adinne.godak aya hitan inne api saudi wage wenawa kiyaneka. Eth atthama katha eka nemai, quraan tula tiyaneka anugaman karana nisa tamange buddiyata hitata a gena hari vidihen terum gattha aya eka adinawa. Samahara aya adinne ne, adinna nethi kattiya a ayalata notheranakama wenna puluwan, o taman a deta akamethi wenna puluwan, o ayalage wena katuyutuwalata eka adineka apahasu wenna puluwan, islam aagama kiyanne samahara dewal tamanma terum aragena karanna ona deyak, blakirima be. Burqawath ohomai. A gena terum gattha aya adinawa. LTTE kaleth o ekata issellath burqa daapu ammala ape srilankawe hitiya. Eth a ammala eliyata awe ne. Oyala hemotama dannawada kiya man danne ne, eth kiyannam, kalin muslim gehanu aliyata anne ne, loku unoth iganeema nawattala gedara innawa. Passe mrry karanawa. Eth den kaale ape minissu poddak wardanaya wela. Igenuma hadagannawa, tamange awashathawata aliyata anawa. Ape minissunge godakma thatha or husbund la pita ratawala inne. Anisa den ape gehanu tamange pawla wedawalata, daruwange wedawalata aliyata anawa.eken tamai burqawa godak aya adina eka aliyata awe. Anisai  Oyalatath metakidi ahema dakinna wune. Kawruwath mawa wenas vidihata hitannepa. Mata jaadhi bedha kohewath ne. Aagamak kiyanne mulinma minisunwa minisa vidiyata jiwath karannata tamai. Eken koi aagamwalath anthawadi o jaathiwadi ne. Ahema minisun atara tiyanawanam a aagame prblm nemai, minisunge hithwala tiyana prblm. Hemoma mata samawenna, deyak kiyannama wenawa, Ltte kaale demala ayata tibba wenaskamata wada ada podi kattiyak karapu jaara weda nisa asarana n duppath api wage minisu kohe giyath hitha wedana vidinawa. Bcz koi kawruth apita baninawa, jara dewal kiyanawa. Eth mole nethi pissek karapu deta hema muslimtama daduwam dennepa. Hemoma kiyanne sri lanka ayalage kiya. Eth mama kiyanne sri lankawa magemai kiya. Apith ape ratata adarai. Apitath a kekkuma tiyanawa. Apith ape 96 worldcup team ayata adarai,a kaale mata awurudu 8 i. eth ape team cup 1 ussanakam man nidagatthe ne. eda susanthika jayasingha jayagatthama api hinawune ne,;mulinma awe ape aswala kadulu. A apema rate kekkuma nisa. A wagema deyak kiyannam, Ltte kaale api hinawune ne, kawru merunoth kawruwunoth minissu neda kiya apith aduwa. Den muslim kiya pissala poddak akathuwimen karapu de balala api hinawune ne, unta merenna onanam taniyenma merenna tibunane, ai ahinsaka jiwathawalta me de kare kiya apith baninawa, shapa karanawa unta. Un nisa ada anith hema muslimwaruntama hithwala wedanawak. Nethiwela giya minisunge pawlwalata wada ada ape hithwala wedanawa n  kadulu godai...a taram apiwa sautthu karanawa. Anika hemotama kiyannam, jihad kiyaneka nikam minisunwa marala niwan suwa lebenawa kiyaneka nemai, unta pissu boru dewal kiya hithwala wasa daanawata. Ape aagamata anuwa kenekta tamange jivithama haani karaganna aithiyak ne, karagannath be, ahema ake me jara weda karapunta, unta sahayoga deepunnata kohewath niwan suwak lebenne ne. Godak comments wala Allah deviyanta kunuharapa idan baninawa, ahema karannepa, minisunge weradiwalata deviyan pali ne, weradi dewal kiyala tibunanam a deviyek wenna be. Allah kisima tenwala naraka dewal kiyala ne. Ekai kiwwe, minissun koi rata wenna puluwan, jaathiyak wenna puluwan eth hoda minihek wenna nam mulin tamange aagama hari vidihata terum aran pilipadinna ona. Koi aagamath weradi dewal kiyanne ne. Salli tiyana minissu ayalage wahanen hari gaman biman yai, eth asarana duppath minissu yanna wenne bus nettham tamange depawalin. Ahema yana minissunta weradi dewal kiyannepa kiya hema muslim kenek wenuwen man oyala hemogenma ahanawa. Api asrana minissu. Api saudi o wena ratak namin kiyana muslim kenek nemai, api ape aagama hari vidihata terum aran ewa hadgena ape rate sri lankawe jiwathwena asarana srilanka muslimwarun. Hemoma ahema ne. Eth godak anniyagamika aya Allah devitai, ape aagamathumanlatai, asrana muslim minissuntai baninawa. Eth Weradi karapu aya netuwa anith api hemoma weradi ne. Eka oyala terum ganna. Samahara aya kiyanawa methakadi muslim aya wenaswela kiya. Eth ahema ne, issara kaale quraan igana ganne gedarata awith kawuru hari aagam kiyala dena kenek, eth den kaarya bahula jiwathveema nisa muslim kattiya quraan iganaganne eliyata awith madrsa wala. Madrasa kiyanne arabi wachana, eke teruma school. Ape aagame quraan 1 aniwarayen  iganaganna ona, eka arabi baasawen tiyana nisa tamai hemoma arab basawai n quraan ake teruma n ewa kohomada, koi vidiyata n koi awastawala a teruma hedune ewai madrasa kiyaneken igana ganne. A nethuwa wena dewal ne. Samahara aya kiyanne ai kalu dagena yanne kiya. Mehemai, man mulin kiyapu wage gehanu kenek tamnge swami purushayata  vitarai aakarshaniya wenna ona.wenath piriminta ape lassana n akarshaniyabawa pennanna be, den kalu paata kiyana kota godak aya balanne ne, den oyalatama kalu paaten burqa adagena kenkwa balanakota apahasutawa wage neda. Gehanu kenek oluwa idan kakul wenakam kalu anduwama kawru hari balanna kematida!!! Nehene. Anisa tamai kalu adinne, eth kaluma tamai adinna ona kiyala ne, akarshaniya nowena tada paata or ulmawarun burqa sadaha paata 7k deela tiyanawa. Eken adinna puluwan. Anika samahara aya Allah ta nettam apita oora (pig) kiyanawa. Oora kiyaneka apita tahanam wachanayak nemai, eka kanna tamai tahanam. Bibile unath kohewath oora kanna kiyala ne. Eka terum ganna. Me dewal gena man kiwwe oyala kaatawath hita narak karanna nemai, bcz ape aagama hetiyata kawruhari deyak notherumen apita kiwwoth or bennoth ayalata udin api sadda daaneka nemai kiyala tiyanne, a nothericha kenata pehadilimath karaneka. Pilipadinna kiya kiyanna be, pehadilimath karanna puluwan. ahema kaata hari man gena weradiyata hituwoth mata samawenna. Puluwankamin n danna ape shodara sinhala basawen me comments type kare. Weradimak wela tibunanam sorry.. ape aagama, adum peladum, anugamana ahema dewal wenaswunata apith ekka ashraya karana sinhala sahodarawarungen ahanna, api anthawadiyada kiya???? Godak wedanawen type karapu comment meka.
